text: za isklyucheniyem tekh, kotoryye svyazany [kakimi-libo uzami] s narodom, s kotorym u vas yest' dogovor, ili kotoryye prishli k vam, a v dushe u nikh net zhelaniya srazhat'sya ni protiv vas, ni protiv svoyego naroda. Yesli by Allakh vozzhelal, On sdelal by [nevernykh] sil'neye vas, i oni togda nepremenno srazilis' by s vami. Yesli zhe oni otstupyat ot vas, ne budut srazhat'sya s vami i predlozhat vam mir, to Allakh ne dozvolit vam [srazhat'sya s nimi]
